# W4 Exercises

## Part 1: Recreating our analysis figure

![](images/kras-01.png){width="450"}

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
load(url("https://github.com/caalo/Intro_to_R/raw/main/classroom_data/CCLE.RData"))

metadata_expression = full_join(metadata, expression, by = "ModelID")
metadata_expression_mutation = full_join(metadata_expression, mutation, by = "ModelID")

lung = metadata_expression_mutation |> filter(OncotreeLineage == "Lung")

ggplot(drop_na(lung), aes(x = KRAS_Mut, y = KRAS_Exp)) + geom_boxplot() + ggtitle("Lung") + theme_bw()
```
